name: Cajun Egg Sandwich
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Change up your next fried egg sandwich by giving it some Cajun flair.
ingredients: 2 ounces andouille smoked sausage, cut in half lengthwise
directions: Whisk mayonnaise and Cajun seasoning together in a small bowl until smooth
Spread over both slices of toasted bread
Place andouille sausage in a skillet, cut-side down
Cook over medium-high heat for 2 minutes
Flip and cook for 2 minutes more
Transfer andouille to one slice of bread, leaving a small space in between the halves as a "raft" to hold the egg in place
Heat oil in the same skillet for 1 minute over medium heat
Crack egg into the skillet and let cook undisturbed for 3 minutes
Flip with a spatula and cook for 2 minutes more
Place fried egg on top of the andouille and cover with the second slice of bread
